full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/21/2023 Resecure M- 1144 06 NOV 1992 DIOCESE OF ARLINGTON REFUGEE SERVICES STATES 915 S. WAKEFIELD STREET DIOCESE OF ARLINGTON, VA 82204 Aul CONFERENCE AFFIDAVIT OF RELATIONSHIP SECTION 1: I am filing this Affidavit for the following person (s) Date filed: July 8/92 located in Kauya Date of arrival in that country: (Country of asylum overseas) NAME AND A/K/A SEX PLACE/DATE OF BIRTH RELATION (underline family name) PRESENT LOCATION TO YOU OR ADDRESS MOHAMED H AHMED M Entite FOIA (b)(6) 'ne case number for this family' is (if available) SECTION II: Your name FOIA (b)(6) Alien Number (if applicable) FOIA (b)(6) (and A/K/A) Your U.S. Immigration Status (Check one) : Date of birth FOIA (b)(6) FOIA (b)(6) Sex Place of birth (-Include Countrill ( ) U.S. Citizen Certificate # FOIA (b) (6) Permanent Resident ( ) Refugee Current address FOIA (b)(6) ( ) Asylee ( ) Other (Please Explain) Phone Number (home) FOIA (b)(6) Your Original Case Number: (work) Country of first asylum FOIA (b)(6) Date you arrived in the U.S. Your Social Security Number Agency through which you came to the United States N/A I have filed an I-I30 (Immigrant Visa Petition) for each of my relative (s) prior to submitting this affidavit Yes No. If yes, date submitted: and date approved: YOU MUST INCLUDE A COPY OF BOTH SIDES OF YOUR I-94 OR YOUR PERMANENT RESIDENT ALIEN CARD (1-151, I-551, GREEN CARD). WITHOUT THESE DOCUMENTS, YOUR AFFIDAVIT IS NOT VALID. The purpose of this Affidavit is to verify your relationship to refugees overseas. Failure to provide complete and accurate information may impede the admission of requested refugees to the U.S. If the information is unknown to you, indicate "unknown". If anyone uses an alias, provide it. If anyone is deceased or their present location is unknown, please indicate. Besure to include all relatives as specified, anywhere in the world, living, deceased or missing. Use the space marked "Additons/Explanations" to explain any unusual relationships including adopted, half, or step relatives. (Revised 10/86)
